description:
Update: added pre3 and TouchPad support.

This game comes in many flavors in many different names. Some call it bubbles, others jawbreaker.  Nonetheless, no one can argue the fact that it is one of the most addicting games played. 

The goal of the game is to pop the balls away. Push on a block of two or more balls of the same color, check the score and click again to pop them away. The larger the group is, the more points you get.  

The game has four modes: standard, continues, shifter & megashift modes. You can select the number of colors to pop from 3 easy colors to 6 colors. 

High scores are stored per game mode per number of colors.

If you have spare time, this game will take it away from you!

now, with a TouchPad friendly user interface.
